title: Howard Kurtz Fox News Poll Voters Distrust Media Donald Trump

organizations.name: obama holdovers withholding intel from trump admin

text:
7 P 
Pres. Trump takes on the Washington bureaucracy and the mainstream media. Charles Krauthammer reacts on The First 100 Days ,followed at 8:00pm ET by The Factor . 9 P 
Pres. Trump escalates his war with the media. Don't miss the latest on Tucker Carlson Tonight . Then at 10:00pm ET , catch powerful reaction from Herman Cain on Hannity . The First 100 Days Kurtz: New Poll Shows Voters Have 'So Much Distrust' of the Media Feb 17, 2017 8:09pm Howard Kurtz says that the latest Fox News Poll shows that Americans are "so polarized" and that there is "so much distrust" of the media. Krauthammer: Trump Should 'Attack' Entrenched DC Bureaucracy Feb 17, 2017 7:34pm Opposition to President Trump from entrenched bureaucracies throughout numerous federal agencies is one of the "main conservative arguments against big government," according to Charles Krauthammer. Tony Shaffer: Obama Holdovers Withholding Intel From Trump Admin Feb 16, 2017 7:45pm Tony Shaffer, a retired lieutenant colonel and intelligence expert, believes the Obama administration "laid trip wires" within the intelligence community's structure to sabotage President Donald...
